about_the_game:
Delicate Blooming Melodies



This is the original soundtrack from OU.

It includes the pieces for one guitar played during the first part of the game, as well as the songs that follow later on when wind, string, and percussion instruments all join in to underscore the story's progress.
There are two versions of the theme song Like Magic, sung in Japanese and in English by Hana Miketa, with her sweet and melodious voice accompanied by a full ensemble.
All songs were composed by Daisuke Shiiba, a former Nintendo composer who is now a freelancer and has worked on such games as From_. and World for Two. His graceful and nostalgic compositions make this album the perfect souvenir to bring back from your trip to U-chronia.
